tool.name: anvi-get-split-coverages
tool.description: Export splits and the coverage table from database
tool.command:
cp -R '${input_profile_db.extra_files_path}' '${output_profile_db.extra_files_path}' &&
#if $input_contigs_db: cp -R '${input_contigs_db.extra_files_path}' '${output_contigs_db.extra_files_path}' #else echo '' #end if && anvi-get-split-coverages --profile-db '${output_profile_db.extra_files_path}/PROFILE.db'
#if $str( $split_name ): --split-name '${split_name}' #end if
--contigs-db '${output_contigs_db.extra_files_path}/CONTIGS.db'
#if $str( $collection_name ): --collection-name '${collection_name}' #end if
#if $str( $bin_id ): --bin-id '${bin_id}' #end if
#if $output_file: --output-file '${output_file}' #end if
${list_splits}
${list_collections}
${list_bins}
&> '${GALAXY_ANVIO_LOG}'

param.name: bin_id
param.label: Bin Id
param.help: Bin name you are interested in.

param.name: list_splits
param.label: List Splits
param.help: When declared, the program will list split names in the profile database and quite

param.name: list_bins
param.label: List Bins
param.help: List available bins in a collection and exit.

tool.help:
usage: anvi-get-split-coverages [-h] -p PROFILE_DB [--split-name SPLIT_NAME] [-c CONTIGS_DB] [-C COLLECTION_NAME] [-b BIN_NAME] [-o FILE_PATH] [--list-splits] [--list-collections] [--list-bins]
Export splits and the coverage table from database
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -p PROFILE_DB, --profile-db PROFILE_DB Anvi'o profile database --split-name SPLIT_NAME Split name. -c CONTIGS_DB, --contigs-db CONTIGS_DB Anvi'o contigs database generated by 'anvi-gen- contigs' -C COLLECTION_NAME, --collection-name COLLECTION_NAME Collection name. -b BIN_NAME, --bin-id BIN_NAME Bin name you are interested in. -o FILE_PATH, --output-file FILE_PATH File path to store results. --list-splits When declared, the program will list split names in the profile database and quite --list-collections Show available collections and exit. --list-bins List available bins in a collection and exit.
ESSENTIAL ANVI'O DB: You need to provide a profile database.
INPUT OPTION #1: SPLIT NAME: You want nothing but the coverage values in a single split. FINE.
INPUT OPTION #2: COLLECTION + BIN: You want nucletide-level coverage values for all splits in a bin. FANCY.
BORING STUFF: The output file and all.
